title: HolographicDisplays全息报错
author: xx578975893
txt_content:
HolographicDisplays全息插件在启动的时候报错
[22:34:52] [Thread-16/WARN]: [HolographicDisplays] Could not contact BukkitDev to check for updates.
[22:34:53] [Thread-15/WARN]: javax.net.ssl.SSLHandshakeException: Remote host closed connection during handshake
[22:34:53] [Thread-15/WARN]:         at sun.security.ssl.SSLSocketImpl.readRecord(Unknown Source)

[22:34:53] [Thread-15/WARN]:         at com.google.common.io.CharSource.openBufferedStream(CharSource.java:107)
[22:34:53] [Thread-15/WARN]:         at org.bukkit.command.defaults.VersionCommand.getDistance(VersionCommand.java:240)

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
xx578975893 发表于 2019-6-29 22:51
可以关了么 不想看到报错
屏蔽即可
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-598149-1-1.html

replies.author: skyliye
replies.txt_content: 检查更新错误，在配置文件关掉checkupdate即可

replies.author: xx578975893
replies.txt_content:
skyliye 发表于 2019-6-29 22:42
检查更新错误，在配置文件关掉checkupdate即可
是update-notification？
没找到checkupdate

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
xx578975893 发表于 2019-6-29 22:49
是update-notification？
没找到checkupdate
无视吧只是无法检测到更新而已

replies.author: xx578975893
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2019-6-29 22:51
无视吧只是无法检测到更新而已

replies.author: skyliye
replies.txt_content:
xx578975893 发表于 2019-6-29 22:49
是update-notification？
没找到checkupdate
就是  带有update字样的  notification   改成false即可
